body.p: Starting with version 17.1, includes support for some DITA 1.3 features.
To enable DITA 1.3 support in and use the DITA Open Toolkit 2.1 for publishing, , go to DITA, and enter ${frameworksDir}/dita/DITA-OT2.x in the DITA OT directory field.

The following table is a list of DITA 1.3 features and their implementation status: DITA 1.3 Features Implementation Status
Feature Editing Publishing
New file templates for creating DITA 1.3 DTD, XML Schema, and Relax NG-based documents Implemented N/A
Validation and content completion for new DITA 1.3 elements Implemented N/A
Annotations presented in the content completion window and tooltips for new DITA 1.3 elements Implemented N/A
Support for scoped keys (define key scopes, allow keyrefs with specified keyscopes) Not implemented Not implemented
Branch filtering (create ditavalrefs) Implemented Not implemented
Shorthand to address element in the same topic Implemented Implemented
Troubleshooting specialization Implemented No special display for troubleshooting elements.
XML markup domain Implemented Implemented
Release management domain Implemented Not implemented
Equation and MathML domain (display and insert equation) Implemented Implemented
SVG domain (display referenced SVG) Implemented Implemented
Learning Object and Group maps Implemented Not implemented
Various table attributes (orientation, rotation, scope, and headers on cells) Not implemented Not implemented
Div element Implemented Implemented
New Map topicref attributes (cascade, deliveryTarget) Implemented Not implemented
